title: PIC: Lasizwe meets Taraji P Henson
text:
PIC: Lasizwe meets Taraji P Henson share this

Johannesburg – First he taught Disney star Skai Jackson a couple of moves, and now Lasizwe is hanging with Taraji P. Henson.

The young reality star is really making the most of his time in Atlanta, sharing posts of himself with a few popular faces.

Posting a pic of himself with Taraji, Lasizwe wrote: "Is this the content you signed up for? I'm with @tarajiphenson."

While he still has not mentioned what exactly his trip to the US city is about, one thing is clear – he's having a great time.

CHECK OUT SOME OF HIS POSTS:
description: First he taught Disney star Skai Jackson a couple of moves, and now Lasizwe is hanging with Taraji P. Henson.
